title: Episode 3: The Brooks Brothers Riot; or Republicans embrace civil disobedience
description: Florida Florida Florida, Episode 3: The Bush team deployed a 4-pronged strategy during the recount, including something very new for Republicans: public protest. Featuring interviews with Ted Cruz, John Bolton, Al Cardenas and Matt Schlapp.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
